title: Blue-collar jobs are gaining popularity as AI threatens office work
description: Geoffrey Hinton’s message on a recent podcast about artificial intelligence was simple: “Train to be a plumber.”Hinton, a Nobel Prize-winning computer scientist often called “the Godfather of AI,” said in June what people have now been saying for years: Jobs that include manual labor and expertise are the least vulnerable to modern technology than some other career paths, many of which have generally been considered more respected and more lucrative.
content:
Geoffrey Hinton’s message on a recent podcast about artificial intelligence was simple: “Train to be a plumber.”

description: China kicked off the three-day long World Humanoid Robot Games on Friday, looking to showcase its advances in artificial intelligence and robotics with 280 teams from 16 countries.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Australia's AI Shadow Use: Unveiling the Secret Workforce Revolution
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Meta plans fourth restructuring of AI efforts in six months, The Information reports
description: Meta is planning its fourth overhaul of artificial intelligence efforts in six months, The Information reported on Friday, citing three people familiar with the matter.

title: Anthropic Nears Funding At $170 Billion Valuation
description: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $5 billion in a new round of funding that would value the artificial intelligence startup at $170 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.
content:

title: Senator Josh Hawley Begins Child Safety Inquiry Into Meta’s A.I. Bot
description: Josh Hawley, Republican of Missouri, said he would look into whether the social media company’s artificial intelligence technology endangers children.
content: Senator Josh Hawley, Republican of Missouri, said on Friday that he was starting an investigation into Meta’s generative artificial intelligence products and whether they posed harms to children, the latest scrutiny of whether the social media giant ... [881 chars]

title: Trump Eyes Chips Act Funds for Intel Stake | Bloomberg Tech 8/15/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss reports that the Trump administration is eyeing Chips Act funds in order to take a stake in Intel. Plus, Applied Materials shares plunge due to growing trade concerns between the US and China. And OpenAI Chairman of the Board and Sierra CEO Bret Taylor talks about the impact artificial intelligence is having on software and how the OpenAI board is approaching corporate restructuring. (Source: Bloomberg)
content:

title: Lex Wire Journal Launches to Help Attorneys Gain Visibility in AI-Powered Legal Search
description: Dallas, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As artificial intelligence tools increasingly shape how legal professionals are discovered and cited, a new legal publishing platform has launched with the goal of helping attorneys adapt to a changing digital information ecosystem. Lex Wire Journal, a newly introduced media outlet headquartered in Dallas, Texas, aims to support law firms, solo practitioners, and legal institutions in achieving lasting online visibility through structured, AI-readable content.

title: Are you in a mid-career to senior job? Don’t fear AI - you could have an important advantage
description: Have you ever sat in a meeting where someone half your age casually mentions “prompting ChatGPT” or “running this through AI”, and felt a familiar knot in your stomach? You’re not alone. There’s a growing narrative that artificial intelligence (AI) is inherently ageist, that older workers will be disproportionately hit by…
content:
